18 struct ReturnToRadialStart : SmaccState< ReturnToRadialStart, RadialMotionStateMachine,
19  mpl::list< NavigationOrthogonalLine, ToolOrthogonalLine > > // <- these are the orthogonal lines of this State
20 {
21  // when this state is finished then move to the RotateDegress state
22  typedef sc::transition<EvActionResult<smacc::SmaccMoveBaseActionClient::Result>, RotateDegress::RotateDegress> reactions;
23 
24 public:
25  using SmaccState::SmaccState;
26

28  {
29  ROS_INFO("-------");
30  ROS_INFO("Entering State: ReturnToRadialStart");
31  }

35  ROS_INFO("Exiting State: ReturnToRadialStart");

42 public:

49 
50 //--------------------------------------------
51 // this is the navigate substate inside the navigation orthogonal line of the ReturnToRadialStart State
52 struct Navigate: SmaccState<Navigate, NavigationOrthogonalLine >
53 {
54 public:
55  // the angle of the current radial motion
56  double yaw;
57 
58  using SmaccState::SmaccState;
59 
60  void onEntry()
61  {
62  ROS_INFO("Entering Navigation");
63 
64  // this substate will need access to the "MoveBase" resource or plugin. In this line
65  // you get the reference to this resource.
66  this->requiresComponent(moveBaseClient_ , ros::NodeHandle("move_base"));
67 
68  this->requiresComponent(odomTracker_);
69 
70  this->requiresComponent(plannerSwitcher_ , ros::NodeHandle("move_base"));
71 
72  // read from the state machine yaw "global variable" to know the current line orientation
73  this->getGlobalSMData("current_yaw", yaw);
74  ROS_INFO_STREAM("[ReturnToRadialStart/Navigate] current yaw:" << yaw );
75 
76  this->plannerSwitcher_->setBackwardPlanner();
77  this->odomTracker_->setWorkingMode(smacc_odom_tracker::WorkingMode::CLEAR_PATH_BACKWARD);
78 
79  returnToRadialStart();
80  }
81 
82  // auxiliar function that defines the motion that is requested to the move_base action server
83  void returnToRadialStart()
84  {
85  smacc::SmaccMoveBaseActionClient::Goal goal;
86  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped radialStartPose;
87 
88  this->getGlobalSMData("radial_start_pose", radialStartPose);
89 
90  goal.target_pose=radialStartPose;
91  goal.target_pose.header.stamp=ros::Time::now();
92 
93  goal.target_pose.pose.orientation = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromRollPitchYaw(0,0, yaw);
94  moveBaseClient_->sendGoal(goal);
95  }
96 
97  // This is the substate destructor. This code will be executed when the
98  // workflow exits from this substate (that is according to statechart the moment when this object is destroyed)
99  ~Navigate()
100  {
101  ROS_INFO("Exiting move goal Action Client");
102  }
103 
104  private:
105  // keeps the reference to the move_base resorce or plugin (to connect to the move_base action server).
106  // this resource can be used from any method in this state
107  smacc::SmaccMoveBaseActionClient* moveBaseClient_;
108 
109  smacc_odom_tracker::OdomTracker* odomTracker_;
110 
111  smacc_planner_switcher::PlannerSwitcher* plannerSwitcher_;
112 };
113

132 struct ToolSubstate
133  : SmaccState<ToolSubstate, ToolOrthogonalLine> {
134 
135 public:
136 
137  using SmaccState::SmaccState;
138 
139  void onEntry()
140  {
141  ROS_INFO("Entering ToolSubstate");
142  this->requiresComponent(toolActionClient_, ros::NodeHandle("tool_action_server"));
143 
144  smacc::SmaccToolActionClient::Goal goal;
145  goal.command = smacc::SmaccToolActionClient::Goal::CMD_STOP;
146  toolActionClient_->sendGoal(goal);
147  }
148 
149  smacc::SmaccToolActionClient* toolActionClient_;
150 };
